exceptions.exn: In environment n, m : nat f : nat -> R -> R k : nat x : R l : posreal Hl : forall y : R_UniformSpace, ball x l y -> forall l j : nat, (n <= l <= m)%nat -> (j <= k)%nat -> ex_derive_n (f l) j y The term "l" has type "posreal" while it is expected to have type "Ring.sort ?K".

In environment n, m : nat f : nat -> R -> R k : nat x : R l : posreal X : ?K -> ?V -> ?V H : forall y : R, ball x l y -> forall l j : nat, (n <= l)%nat -> (l <= m)%nat -> (j <= k)%nat -> ex_derive_n (f l) j y Unable to unify "is_linear (fun y : ?K0 => scal y (scal ?M2825 ?M2826)) /\\ (forall x0 : AbsRing_NormedModule ?K0, is_filter_lim (locally ?M2824) x0 -> is_domin (locally ?M2824) (fun y : AbsRing_NormedModule ?K0 => minus y x0) (fun y : AbsRing_NormedModule ?K0 => minus (minus ((fun x1 : ?K0 => scal (?M2823 x1) ?M2826) y) ((fun x1 : ?K0 => scal (?M2823 x1) ?M2826) x0)) ((fun y0 : ?K0 => scal y0 (scal ?M2825 ?M2826)) (minus y x0))))" with "Derive_n (fun y : R => sum_n_m (fun j : nat => f j y) n m) k x = sum_n_m (fun j : nat => Derive_n (f j) k x) n m".

original: intros f x k H. unfold ex_derive in H. destruct H as [l Hl]. exists (scal l k). apply is_derive_scal_l. auto.
